testsuite.name: testCases.Module1_Login

testcase.name: VerifyLoginWithValidData
testcase.system-out: Launched Chrome browser Browser Maximized Navigated to https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login Implicit wait set to: 10 seconds Locator Used -> xpath://h5[text()='Login'] Login Text is displayed Locator Used -> cssSelector:input[placeholder='Username'] Entered Admin into Username Text Field Locator Used -> cssSelector:input[placeholder='Password'] Entered admin123 into Password Text Field Locator Used -> xpath://button[normalize-space(.)='Login'] Clicked on Login Button Locator Used -> xpath://h6[text()='Dashboard'] Dashboard Text is displayed

testcase.name: VerifyLoginWithInvalidData
testcase.system-out: Launched Chrome browser Browser Maximized Navigated to https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login Implicit wait set to: 10 seconds Locator Used -> xpath://h5[text()='Login'] Login Text is displayed Locator Used -> cssSelector:input[placeholder='Username'] Entered Admin into Username Text Field Locator Used -> cssSelector:input[placeholder='Password'] Entered Admin into Password Text Field Locator Used -> xpath://button[normalize-space(.)='Login'] Clicked on Login Button Locator Used -> xpath://p[text()='Invalid credentials'] Invalid Credential Text is displayed

testcase.name: VerifyLoginWithNoData
